name: GoalCue
description: App for tracking personal goals and cueing one to be active.

scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rimraf node_modules dist .turbo build && pnpm --workspace-root exec rimraf node_modules dist .turbo .nitro .output .tanstack .cache .vercel
scripts.repare: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm build

author: Vladimir Cajka
